recipesJson.name: Doh-Ray-Me
recipesJson.author: FuriousMixer
recipesJson.description: Freshly baked doughnut with a light dusting of cinnamon sugar. Sweetener option. I use 0.25% super sweet and it was really nice. Be sure to give this recipe a MINIMUM 7 day steep due to FLV sweet dough needing time to fully do its job. The longer you leave it the more doughnut forward the recipe will be. Please leave a rating and review on the recipe for others to see. Happy mixing ðŸ’™

reviews.text: Best donut recipe Iâ€™ve had, I accidentally mixed some with my pebble rock juice and man o man it mixes with fruits really well!
Awesome! Very good doughnut flavor that's true to the description. Good job on this recipe, thanks for sharing!
